title: Unnecessarily convoluted
review: This movie is great till you get to the part of the science fiction. It could have been a fantastic thriller.

title: Just decent enough
review: Infinity War is just too big of a movie to overcome & Endgame suffers from trying to do it. The pacing was bad. Some characters are misrepresented & their arcs are ruined by doing so. Somehow this movie can't handle the amount of characters in it, but it's predecessor do it really great. Disappointing.
